channel.title: docker on unixorn.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in docker on unixorn.github.io

item.title: Things I Learned About Docker Mac
item.description: I had a bunch of cruft in start scripts that would determine the IP of my laptop and set it as an environment variable to pass to docker-compose and it turns out that with Docker for Mac you don’t have to do all that work - just use docker.for.mac.localhost as a hostname.
